mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ONLINE_LIST WHERE CLASS_STATUS = 'Y' AND CLASS_TYPE_NO = #{classType} ORDER BY CLASS_NO DESC

SELECT CNT, (SELECT CLASS_TYPE_NAME FROM CLASS_TYPE WHERE CLASS_TYPE_NO = #{classType}) CLASS_TYPE_NAME FROM (SELECT COUNT(*) CNT FROM ONLINE_LIST WHERE CLASS_TYPE_NO = #{classType} AND CLASS_STATUS = 'Y')

SELECT CLASS_NO, CATEGORY_NAME, CLASS_TITLE, CLASS_CONTENT, MEMBER_NO, MEMBER_NICKNAME, CLASS_READ_COUNT, CLASS_CREATE_DT, CLASS_TYPE_NO FROM CLASS_PAGE JOIN CATEGORY USING(CATEGORY_NO) JOIN MEMBER USING(MEMBER_NO) WHERE CLASS_NO = #{classNo} AND CLASS_STATUS = 'Y'
